onAreaTouched

boolean onAreaTouched(TouchEvent pSceneTouchEvent,
                      float pTouchAreaLocalX,
                      float pTouchAreaLocalY)
This method only fires if this Scene.ITouchArea is registered to the Scene via Scene.registerTouchArea(ITouchArea).

Parameters:
pSceneTouchEvent -
Returns:
true if the event was handled (that means Scene.IOnAreaTouchListener of the Scene will not be fired!), otherwise false.
